name: Memoria Escape
description:
You play as a treasure hunter as you transverse through the puzzles of a ancient ruins in search of the forgotten memories of their era but beware of what lies asleep.

This game is developed for the Mini Jam 54: Memories!

Total Game Duration: 5-10 minutes

Game Dev Postmortem:

Being the very first game I've made and its in a game jam, the quality does show from its non existing puzzle "puzzle games" and the fairly straight forward shooter gameplay. Although with every experience, I did learn a couple new skills and approach with one being to test a gameplay loop first before writing down all the modular systems....... That being said, I can use that very same system for my passion project so that's also a win. 

Overall this game jam was fun and interesting, 10/10 would jam again.
